title: National Book Foundation Act, 1972
description: Official consolidated text of National Book Foundation Act, 1972 (XIX of 1972) published by The Pakistan Code (Departmental Laws).

provisions.title: Section 1. Short title, extent and commencement
provisions.content:
(1) This Act may be called the National Book
Foundation Act, 1972.
(2) It extends to the whole of Pakistan.
(3) It shall come into force at once.

provisions.title: Section 2. Definitions. In this Act, unless there is anything repugnant in the subject or context,
provisions.content:
(a)     “books” shall include textbooks, reference books and other books on religion
and other books and reading material for use by students and the general public;
and
(b)     “Foundation” means the Foundation established under this Act.

provisions.title: Section 3. Establishment of the Foundation
provisions.content:
(1) As soon as may be after the commencement of
this Act, the Federal Government may, for the purpose of making books available at moderate prices,
by notification in the official Gazette, establish a National Book Foundation, hereinafter referred to as
the Foundation.
(2) The Foundation shall be a body corporate having perpetual succession and a common seal
with power to acquire, hold and dispose of property, both movable and immovable.

provisions.title: Section 4. Constitution of the Foundation
Section 5. Managing Director. The Managing Director shall be the chief executive officer of the
provisions.content:
Foundation and shall, subject to the general supervision of the Chairman of the Board of Governors,
be responsible for carrying out the objects of the Foundation as laid down by the Board from time to
time.

provisions.title: Section 6. Functions of the Foundation. The following shall be the functions of the Foundation,
Section 7. Audit. The accounts of the Foundation shall be audited annually by the Auditor
provisions.content:
General of
Pakistan and the balance-sheet and statements of assets and liabilities shall be duly considered by the
Board of Governors.
